attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown, the country dislikes you, the country dislikes your lack of backbone and lack of direction. You need to resign and resign now to force a General Election so the people can decide. You are the most hated prime-minister in British History and you only got the job by default. If you had been labour leader at the last GE then labour would not have one. Accept that fact and bow out gracefully.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
